release_notes.en-US: This version handles the new API response schema in the Great DANE Engine, and changes the default Great DANE Engine URL to the one hosted at https://tools.greatdanenow.com/engine, rather than defaulting to a locally-installed instance (since most users just want to easily try it out).

Bug fixes:
- Removed duplicate slashes from Great DANE Engine URL
